name: flashpoint-launcher
description: A desktop application used to browse, manage and play games from BlueMaxima's Flashpoint

scripts.pack:linux: npx cross-env PACK_PLATFORM=linux PACK_ARCH=x64 npx gulp pack
scripts.pack:win32: npx cross-env PACK_PLATFORM=win32 PACK_ARCH=ia32 npx gulp pack
scripts.pack:darwin: npx cross-env PACK_PLATFORM=darwin PACK_ARCH=x64 npx gulp pack
scripts.pack:all: npx cross-env PACK_PLATFORM=all PACK_ARCH=all npx gulp pack
scripts.release: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack"
scripts.release:linux: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack:linux"
scripts.release:win32: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack:win32"
scripts.release:darwin: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack:darwin"
scripts.release:all: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack:all"
scripts.build:static: npx cross-env STATIC_INSTALL=1 npx gulp build
scripts.pack:static: npx cross-env STATIC_INSTALL=1 npx gulp pack
scripts.pack:linux:static: npx cross-env STATIC_INSTALL=1 PACK_PLATFORM=linux PACK_ARCH=x64 npx gulp pack
scripts.pack:win32:static: npx cross-env STATIC_INSTALL=1 PACK_PLATFORM=win32 PACK_ARCH=ia32 npx gulp pack
scripts.pack:darwin:static: npx cross-env STATIC_INSTALL=1 PACK_PLATFORM=darwin PACK_ARCH=x64 npx gulp pack
scripts.pack:all:static: npx cross-env STATIC_INSTALL=1 PACK_PLATFORM=all PACK_ARCH=all npx gulp pack
scripts.release:static: npx cross-env-shell STATIC_INSTALL=1 NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack"
scripts.release:linux:static: npx cross-env-shell STATIC_INSTALL=1 NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack:linux"
scripts.release:win32:static: npx cross-env-shell STATIC_INSTALL=1 NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack:win32"
scripts.release:darwin:static: npx cross-env-shell STATIC_INSTALL=1 NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack:darwin"
scripts.release:all:static: npx cross-env-shell STATIC_INSTALL=1 NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack:all"

author: Jesper Gustafsson
